conversation.content: I want to find comfortable and stylish jeans that I can wear daily in varying weather conditions. within my expected price range: [34.6, 69.5]

Based on your budget range, I recommend the Wrangler Rugged Wear Men's Woodland Thermal Jean. It is priced at $39.97 and offers incredible warmth without bulk.
